channel.title: Next Steps on AWS Well-Architected Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Next Steps on AWS Well-Architected Labs

item.title: Cleanup
item.description: If you used an account provided by Event Engine, you do not need to do any cleanup. The account terminates when the event is over. If you used your own account, please remove the three CloudFormation stacks you deployed. X Congratulations! Now that you have completed the lab, if you have implemented this knowledge in your environment, you should re-evaluate the questions in the Well-Architected tool. This lab specifically helps you with REL 13 How do you plan for disaster recovery (DR)?
